tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_addresses (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  address_line1 VARCHAR(255),
  address_line2 VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(2),
  zip_code INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_addresses (
  address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  address_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  location_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_addresses (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address_street TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE plotted_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    location_name TEXT,
    plotted_latitude FLOAT,
    plotted_longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_addresses (
    user_id UUID,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geocoding_data (
    geocoding_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    accuracy INT
);
